name: ccAvenue gateway for WooCommerce
author: Coravity Infotech

sections.description:
Are you looking for a ccAvenue integration plugin for woocommerce?
This plugin will provide you with the hassle free integration of ccAvenue payment gateway in the woocommerce plugin. The plugin is last checked with the ccAvenue API on June, 2015. It will redirect users to ccAvenue which will also it to run on websites without SSL enabled.

Difficult steps of integration

  • Get the Merchant ID and working key by logging into your verified ccAvenue Merchant panel.(Settings and Options > Generate Working Key)
  • Put the above field in (woocommerce > settings > Checkout > ccavenue) under respective fields and save.
  • Now go and place a test order.
sections.installation:
1. Download Plugin.
  2. Upload the ‘ccAvenue gateway for WooCommerce’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate ‘ccAvenue gateway for WooCommerce’ from your Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.0.4 – 27/12/2017

  • Fix – HTTPS Security Warning.

1.0.3 – 27/07/2015

  • Critical Fix – Order Completion message even on failed transaction.

1.0.2 – 25/06/2015

  • Fix – Resolved Conflicts with other ccavenue plugins using same functiona names.

1.0.1 – 20/06/2015

  • Fix – While paying again for a failed transaction payment gateway throwing duplicate order error.
  • Added Plugin icon.
  • Updated Screenshots
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download Plugin.
  2. Upload the ‘ccAvenue gateway for WooCommerce’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate ‘ccAvenue gateway for WooCommerce’ from your Plugins page.
